title: Process Monthly Subscription Billing
description: The system needs to process recurring monthly payments for all customers subscribed to a 'Coffee of the Month' club.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all active subscriptions due for renewal today.
tasks.expected_outcome: System retrieves a list of all customers to be billed.

tasks.description: For each subscription, charge the customer's saved payment method for the monthly fee.
For each successful payment, automatically generate a new order for this month's coffee.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates new orders for all successfully billed customers.
